mapper.sql: id, doctorCode, doctorName, adminType, COMMENTS, STATE, IS_DELETEMARK, MODIFY_TIME, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_ID, currencyField
mapper.select:
SELECT p.id, p.doctorCode, p.doctorName, p.adminType, p.COMMENTS, p.STATE, p.IS_DELETEMARK, p.MODIFY_TIME, p.CREATE_TIME, p.CREATE_USER_ID, p.MODIFY_USER_ID, GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(d.deptCode,'-',d.deptName)) currencyField FROM yb_appeal_confire p left join yb_appeal_confire_data d on p.id = d.pid and d.IS_DELETEMARK =1 where p.IS_DELETEMARK = 1
and (p.doctorCode like concat('%', #{ doctorContent } ,'%') or p.doctorName like concat('%', #{ doctorContent } ,'%'))
and p.adminType = #{ adminType }
and p.id in(select DISTINCT pid from yb_appeal_confire_data where deptName like concat('%', #{ deptContent } ,'%'))
GROUP BY p.id order by p.create_time desc
